name: Archer & Hound Advertising
tagline: We've Been Called Small But Mighty. We Like That.
description:
We aren’t the biggest agency in town, nor do we strive to be. In fact, we’re a little bit scrappy. But for our purposes here, let’s go with lean and dynamic. We don’t waste time on fancy titles—we’d rather invest in smart strategies, new ideas and moving creative.
It’s working; our clients are happy, and in 2014, we were recognized as the Fresno Advertising Federation Agency of the Year. We work hard, we play hard, and company culture means everything to us.
